Please do not drink and drive. 

This application is for entertainment and informational purposes only. 

Drinkster is in no way purported to be a guideline for how much you can drink and still drive or avoid being arrested. 

Drinkster does NOT serve as LEGAL ADVICE. 

The results from Drinkster's BAC Estimator are rough estimates for an average person only. Your actual blood alcohol concentration depends on a variety of additional factors, like genetic makeup, personal health, and recent food consumption. Do not rely on these results to drive or work. 

Drinkster and its developer are not legally responsible for anything you do while under the influence of alcohol or any other substances. 

Please drink responsibly.
